Package com.github.sahasatvik.cli

Class ArgumentException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.github.sahasatvik.cli.ArgHandlerException
          • com.github.sahasatvik.cli.ArgumentException
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NoArgumentOfRequiredTypeFoundException, NoRemainingArgumentsException

    public class ArgumentException
extends ArgHandlerException
    This is the superclass of all Exceptions related to the parsing of arguments in ArgHandler.

    1.0
